alert.note: Alert for Cameron (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 13 at 11:47PM EDT by NWS State College
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1215 AM EDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN CAMERON...CENTRAL CENTRE...NORTHEASTERN CLEARFIELD AND NORTHWESTERN CLINTON COUNTIES... At 1147 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Karthaus to near Clarence to Snow Shoe, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Bellefonte, Keating, Renovo, Milesburg, Snow Shoe, Clarence, South Renovo, Julian, Monument, Westport, Bald Eagle State Park and Howard. For those driving on Interstate 80, this includes areas between the Kylertown and Lamar exits, specifically from mile markers 145 to 168. This includes Interstate 99 near mile marker 85. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
